entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 3:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
